snippet.title: Study: Unvaccinated Children Are 'Kindling' for Outbreaks
snippet.description: * Study: Unvaccinated Children Are 'Kindling' for Outbreaks Using disease outbreaks in the wild as a model, researchers show that seasonal birth rates and kids' vaccination schedules could impact outbreaks of measles.

snippet.title: 9 Holiday Gift Ideas for People Living With Crohn’s Disease
snippet.description: * 9 Holiday Gift Ideas for People Living With Crohn’s Disease Unsure what to give the person with Crohn’s on your holiday shopping list? There’s a gift guide for that. Check out these 10 suggestions.

snippet.title: 7 Tips for Better Sleep
snippet.description: * 7 Tips for Better Sleep Trouble getting to bed at night? You're not alone. Learn how to build your sleep sanctuary for a good night's rest.

snippet.title: 11 Holiday Gift Ideas for People With MS
snippet.description: * 11 Holiday Gift Ideas for People With MS Have someone with MS on your shopping list and don’t know what to get them? Check out these helpful, thoughtful condition-specific gift ideas.
